translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmas of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: mngon bar shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the true dharmic nature of the dhāraṇī gateways.🔽The powers of the tathāgatas are not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the powers of the tathāgatas.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @212a *// pa med do //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the suchness of great compassion.🔽The dharmatā of great compassion is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere, apart from the dharmatā of great compassion.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The distinct attributes of a buddha are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not something other than the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the perfection of wisdom.

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not something other than the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The true dharmic nature of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not something other than the true dharmic nature of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: thams cad shes ba nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path is also not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of the aspects of the path is also not the perfection of wisdom.

translated: the perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of path aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere than the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of the knowledge of all aspects is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do ////

translated: Thus, Kauśika, because all dharmas do not exist and are not found,

original: gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: form is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from form.🔽The suchness of form is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the suchness of form.

original: gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of form is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom apart from the real nature of form.

original: tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: @213b tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom apart from feeling.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of feeling is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of feeling is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽'du shes kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // 'du shes kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom apart from the real nature of feeling.🔽Perception is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du shes las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there the perfection of wisdom apart from perception.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of perception is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the suchness of perception.🔽The real nature of perception is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du shes kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the real nature of perception.

original: 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Formations are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from formations.🔽The suchness of formations is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the suchness of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of formations is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the reality of volitional factors.🔽Volitional factors are not the perfection of wisdom.

translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than volitional factors.🔽The suchness of volitional factors is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of volitional factors.🔽The reality of volitional factors is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽mig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // mig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the reality of volitional factors.🔽The eyes are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mig las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: mig las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the eyes.

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the eyes is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽mig gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // mig gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the suchness of the eyes.🔽The dharmatā of the eyes is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mig gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the dharmatā of the eyes.

original: rna ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The ears are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rna ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the ears.🔽The suchness of the ears is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rna ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rna ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the suchness of the ears.🔽The dharmatā of the ears is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rna ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the dharmatā of the ears.

original: sna'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sna'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the nose is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: sna las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sna las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: and the perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the nose.🔽The true dharmic nature of the nose is not the perfection of wisdom,

analyzed: sna'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: lce'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

original: lce'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: lce'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of the tongue is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: lce'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

original: lus kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: lus kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The body is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: lus las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

original: yid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: yid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the mind.

analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the mind is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽yid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // yid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the mind.🔽The true dharmic nature of the mind is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: yid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the true dharmic nature of the mind.

translated: Form is also not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than form.🔽The suchness of form is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The true dharmic nature of form is also not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: dri'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of smell is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: dri'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: dri'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from the real nature of smell there is no perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The dharmatā of the consciousness element is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not somewhere other than the dharmatā of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig @220b pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig @220b pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Ignorance is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not somewhere other than ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of ignorance is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not somewhere other than the suchness of ignorance.🔽The dharmatā of ignorance is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: ma rig pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not somewhere other than the dharmatā of ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Formations are also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than volitional factors.🔽The suchness of volitional factors is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of volitional factors.🔽The true dharmic nature of volitional factors is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the true dharmic nature of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than consciousness.🔽The suchness of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The dharmatā of consciousness is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽ming dang gzugs @221a *//🔽las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / ming dang gzugs @221a *// las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Name and form are not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than name and form.🔽The suchness of name and form is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of name and form.🔽The dharmatā of name and form is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of name and form.

original: skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The six sense fields are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye mched drug las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the six sense fields.🔽The suchness of the six sense fields is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the six sense fields.🔽The true nature of the six sense fields is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the true nature of the six sense fields.

original: reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Contact is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than contact.

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of contact is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: the suchness of contact is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the dharma-constituent of contact is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from the dharma-constituent of contact there is also no perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba'ang shes rab @221b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang shes rab @221b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Feeling is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from feeling there is also no perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of feeling is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: and apart from the suchness of feeling there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The dharma-constituent of feeling is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: and apart from the dharma-constituent of feeling there is also no perfection of wisdom.

original: sred pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Craving is also not the perfection of wisdom,

original: sred pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: craving is not the perfection of wisdom,🔽the suchness of craving is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the suchness of craving is not other than the perfection of wisdom,🔽the true dharmic nature of craving is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽len pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // len pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the true dharmic nature of craving is not other than the perfection of wisdom,🔽grasping is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: len pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: len pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: grasping is not other than the perfection of wisdom,🔽the suchness of grasping is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: len pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: len pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: the suchness of grasping is not other than the perfection of wisdom,

original: len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the true dharmic nature of grasping is not the perfection of wisdom,

original: len pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽srid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: len pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // srid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the reality of appropriation.🔽Existence is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: srid pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma @222a *//
analyzed: srid pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma @222a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than existence.🔽The suchness of existence is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: yin / srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: yin / srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of existence.🔽The reality of existence is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: srid pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: srid pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the reality of existence.🔽Birth is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than birth.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of birth is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽skye ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // skye ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Apart from the suchness of birth there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The dharmatā of birth is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: skye ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Apart from the dharmatā of birth there is also no perfection of wisdom.

original: rga shi'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rga shi'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Aging and death is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rga shi las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rga shi las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Apart from aging and death there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The suchness of aging and death is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rga shi'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rga shi'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Apart from the suchness of aging and death there is also no perfection of wisdom.🔽The dharmatā of aging and death is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Apart from the dharmatā of aging and death there is also no perfection of wisdom.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of generosity is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sbyin @222b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin @222b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the perfection of generosity.🔽The true nature of the perfection of generosity is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true nature of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin //
translated: The perfection of discipline is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not something other than the perfection of morality.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not something other than the suchness of the perfection of morality.🔽The true dharmic nature of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not something other than the true dharmic nature of the perfection of morality.🔽The perfection of patience is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not something other than the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the perfection of patience is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom🔽anywhere to be found apart from the suchness of the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes @223a *//
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes @223a *//
translated: The true dharmic nature of the perfection of patience is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anywhere to be found apart from the true dharmic nature of the perfection of patience.

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

translated: The perfection of wisdom is also not outside the dharmatā of emptiness that is not discarded.🔽The emptiness of nature is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also not outside the suchness of the emptiness of nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The dharmatā of the emptiness of nature is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than the emptiness of all phenomena.

translated: The suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽The dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of defining characteristics is not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas is not the perfection of wisdom,🔽the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas is not other than the perfection of wisdom,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos @231a *//🔽nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos @231a *//🔽nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: the true nature of the powers of the tathāgatas is not the perfection of wisdom,🔽and the true nature of the powers of the tathāgatas is not other than the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The fearlessnesses are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the fearlessnesses.🔽The suchness of the fearlessnesses is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the suchness of the fearlessnesses.🔽The true dharmic nature of the fearlessnesses is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the true dharmic nature of the fearlessnesses.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is the perfection of wisdom anything other than the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the correct understandings is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the suchness of the correct understandings.🔽The true nature of the correct understandings is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽byams pa chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽byams pa chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // byams pa chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / byams pa chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the true nature of the correct understandings.🔽Great love is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from great love.

original: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of great love is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: byams pa chen @231b po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen @231b po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of great love is also not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The real nature of great love is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: byams pa chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of great love is also not the perfection of wisdom.🔽Great compassion is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Great compassion is also not the perfection of wisdom.🔽The suchness of great compassion is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The suchness of great compassion is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The real nature of great compassion is also not the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of great compassion.🔽The special qualities of the Buddha are not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the special qualities of the Buddha.🔽The suchness of the special qualities of the Buddha is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the special qualities of the Buddha.🔽The dharmatā of the special qualities of the Buddha is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the dharmatā of the special qualities of the Buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /🔽thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang @232a *//
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin / thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang @232a *//
translated: The knowledge of all modes is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the knowledge of all modes.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all modes is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the suchness of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The true nature of the knowledge of all modes is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the true nature of the knowledge of all modes.🔽The knowledge of paths is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: Nor is there a perfection of wisdom apart from the knowledge of paths.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of path aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //🔽lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.🔽The true dharmic nature of the knowledge of path aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the true dharmic nature of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not elsewhere from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @232b pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.🔽The dharmatā of the knowledge of all aspects is not the perfection of wisdom.
